summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 27, authorizing execution of a collective bargaining agreement effective January 1, 2005 through December 31, 2005, a collective bargaining agreement effective January 1, 2006 through December 31, 2008, and a memorandum of understanding (four-person staffing) between the City of Seattle and the International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 27, and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
